wasteReductions.name: Install new filtration system to reduce solid waste
wasteReductions.description: The new filtration system will remove more solid waste from the production line, reducing the amount of waste that is sent to the landfill.

wasteReductions.name: Implement new recycling program for liquid waste
wasteReductions.description: The new recycling program will divert liquid waste from the sewer system and send it to a recycling facility.

wasteReductions.name: Upgrade combustion equipment to reduce gaseous waste
wasteReductions.description: The new combustion equipment will produce less gaseous waste, reducing the amount of air pollution.
